short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve productivity with this extension! Monitor multiple dashboards on a single screen with automatic tab rotation. Try it now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Chrome extension is designed to enhance your productivity by allowing you to monitor multiple dashboards simultaneously on a single screen. With its automatic tab rotation feature, you no longer need to manually switch between tabs, as the extension will do it for you. Additionally, the extension is easy to use and can be installed quickly. Try it now and experience the benefits of increased productivity.
